Articles.Content:
[CENTER][SIZE=6]PF-K3UA
[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[SIZE=6][/SIZE]The podfighter MK3 otherwise known as the PF-K3UA is an uarnmed version for the PF-K3 made by the Kerbin Military.



The fighter itself is highly manueverable,They can outmanuever most stock jets if not all and can reach into the stratosphere with testing currently topping at 500 m/s.



DOWNLOAD: [URL]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7EJk6Q2W8tqVUVId1FIb2I5UWc/view[/URL]

[SIZE=2]Modded craft: Not yet uploaded[/SIZE]
Pictures will not be added due to lack of knowledge of the image system of forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com
Have fun and don't repost my craft unaltered without my permission,you can reupload Different variants of the aircraft engine types to the aircraft without my permission if you atleast giv eme some credit for the design of the body fo the fighter and all,keep in mind this fighter is a replica of my PF-3KA,which has a Radome for the nose for the aircraft's nose,so this aircraft has more fuel than the modded craft.
[COLOR=#ff0000][U][I][B][SIZE=1]Keepinmindthisisaprototypeaircraft,wearenotrepsonsibleforanykerbaldeathsregardingextremeG-forces,ifyouhaveanyallergiesregardingHIPForHIGPpleaseseeaUKSMDMedictogaugeyourallergicreactionsbeforeflight,YOUHAVEBEENWARNED.[/SIZE][/B][/I][/U][/COLOR]
If you want to post pictures, imgur is the popular way to go. Upload the pictures to there, then copy the forum URL from there to here.
